body.name: Midea MDF18A1AST Built-in Dishwasher with 8 Place Settings, 6 Washing Programs, Stainless Steel Tub, Heated Dry, Energy Star
features: 【Slimline Design with Large Capacity】The Midea built-in dishwasher boasts a slim body that takes up minimal space and is easy to fit. It features a digital control panel with an LED display and has been thoughtfully designed to accommodate larger plates, pots, and pans up to 11 inches in height.
【8 Place Settings Dishwasher】With dimensions of 24.41"D x 17.72"W x 33.27"H with adjustable legs, this under sink dishwasher provides a spacious and flexible interior for maximum dishware loading.

【6 programs+3 functions】The 18-inch dishwasher offers six programs, including Heavy, Normal, ECO, Delicate, Quick, and Rinse washing programs. It also features Heated Dry, Hi-Temp, and Sanitize functions that meet all your daily needs. Note: ONLY use detergent specially for dishwasher because regular liquid dish soap will cause dishwasher problems.

【Heated Dry】Smart dishwasher ensures the best drying performance. The extra drying function offers a thorough drying performance (except for the Rapid and Self-clean cycle) with no additional towel drying required.

【HI TEMP】The HYGIENE wash cycle maintains the water temperature at 136°F (58°C) max , which can tackle even the heaviest soiled dishes. It is also suitable for cleaning baby bottles and children's dinner sets.
body.description: Midea slimline dishwasher is perfect for small kitchens or apartments. It has a large capacity of 8 place settings, meaning you can fit all your dishes while taking up minimal space. With 6 programs and 3 functions to choose from, you can customize your wash to get the best results every time. The heated dry function ensures that your dishes come out dry and ready to use, while the HI TEMP function provides a thorough clean by using high temperature water to sanitize your dishes. The sanitize function keeping your dishes clean and safe. Additionally, this build in dishwasher is Energy Star 7.0 certified, meaning it is energy-efficient and helps you save money on your electricity bill. Upgrade your kitchen with this slimline dishwasher today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Choose Your Reliable Wash Cycle Intensive Wash Efficiently cleans the heaviest soiled dishes and cooking utensils, your tableware is hygienic to use with a high temperature up to 158F°. 1-Hour Quick Wash Ultra quick cleaning cycle allows more time for your dinner parties. Delicate Glass Wash The delicate wash cycle rinses your glasses gently with low temperature and a spotless & sparking finish.

Easy Loading for Verastile Tableware Versatile Cup Shelves You can invert the teacups on the shelves or adjust the stemware glasses on the dedicated glass holder. Also, forks, knives and spoons can be gathered tidily on the shelves. The smart design of the top rack and the sturdy utensil basket protects and ensures a better drying performance. Maximized Space for Large Items Maximized space in the lower basket allows for larger items like platters, cookie sheets and big pots. Cutlery Basket Use the cutlery basket for forks and knives, or easily remove it for extra space to place larger cookware items.

User Friendly Design for a Cleaning Experience Heated Dry The extra drying function offers a thorough drying performance (except for the Rapid and Self-clean cycle) with no additional towel drying required. 24 Hours Delay Start You can delay the start of the wash cycle by 3,6 or 9 hours and even up to 24 hours with the selected cycle for convenience and enables you to save energy by avoiding off-peak power rates. Intuitive Operation Sleek & smooth control panel, intuitive and easy to use.

reviews.reviewText: This was easy to install and works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It holds A LOT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It arrived on time with no damage, and all parts needed were there.
reviews.reviewText: It came stainless steel, thought I ordered white, but kept it and installed it. Seems to work fine, have used it a few times, and the dishes came out clean. Did not use the heat dry, so need to open door to get all dishes dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little workhorse that holds more than you think
reviews.reviewText: We moved into a house with new dishwasher and a small kitchen, so we needed a compact dishwasher to be sure we didn't take up too much room. I was worried that we were going to have to run loads constantly, but it actually holds a lot more than I thought it would. It actually cleans better than the kenmore we had at our last house. I love the 1 hr quick wash function, as if we do have a couple loads piling up we can power through them quicker than normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Compact Dishwasher!!
reviews.reviewText: We are in the process of remodeling our kitchen, and since all new appliances are on the agenda, I got us this Midea Slimline Built-in Dishwasher.As shown in my pics, this dishwasher is compact in size; it is much smaller than the old, full-size model that came with our house, which stopped working a couple of years ago. But once we get all new cabinets installed, it will fit perfectly flush.Since we were just replacing, installation wasn’t difficult; took my husband about 2 hours to remove the old unit and get this one installed. A detailed installation manual is included in the box.Having a 22-month-old granddaughter, I will say that it’s hard to keep her fingerprints off of it, but this is an awesome machine!I love the digital control panel, with the LED display; it’s very user-friendly and holds more dishes than one would think; perfect for our small family.I really love the 1-hour quick wash option and the sanitizing function; having another granddaughter due any day, this dishwasher will safely clean her bottles.Overall, we are thoroughly impressed with this slimline dishwasher; it’s beautiful, quiet, easy-to-use, and gets all of our dishes nice and clean on every cycle.Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We are adding a mother in law suite to our home and this is a perfect size for that addition. We have built a home for her in the back of our home, it is not huge but it is a perfect size for her to be comfortable. The kitchen is not huge and this is perfect for that space.We are happy that we found this, it is a great size for smaller spaces and for smaller loads of dishes. I cant wait until we get her place done and to get the kitchen done and this installed. I think this will be perfect and will work great for her. She cant stand for extended periods of time, so this will be great for her.It is a stainless steel, sleek looking dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What a great little dishwasher! Ordered for a vacation home as we didn't need a normal full size dishwasher there, and this has not disappointed! While it is smaller than a regular dishwasher it still holds a great amount of dishes. It was actually surprisingly lightweight as well. Easy to install, my husband has installed other dishwashers for us before so it wasn't to hard to do. Did take a little bit of time but came with full assembly instructions so even someone who has never done this before can do so. Dishwasher is quiet and plays a nice little tune when finished. Has several washing modes to choose from which I love because not ever load is the same! Does a fantastic job at getting dishes clean. I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Another Midea joke.
reviews.reviewText: This company has horrendous customer support. My range is another nightmare I bought. This DOES NOT HAVE A POWER CORD. THEY LIE. Silly design. It does clean dishes well. But if it fails. Good luck.Never again.
